Electronics.name: PlayStation 5 (PS5)
Electronics.shortDesc: Next-generation gaming console with lightning-fast loading and stunning graphics.
Electronics.longDesc: The PlayStation 5 represents the pinnacle of gaming technology, featuring a custom AMD Zen 2 CPU, RDNA 2 GPU, and ultra-high speed SSD. Experience games like never before with ray tracing, 3D audio, and the innovative DualSense controller with haptic feedback.

Electronics.name: Xbox Series X
Electronics.shortDesc: Most powerful Xbox ever with 4K gaming and Quick Resume technology.
Electronics.longDesc: The Xbox Series X delivers 4K gaming at up to 120 frames per second, with Quick Resume technology that lets you seamlessly switch between multiple games. Powered by a custom AMD Zen 2 CPU and RDNA 2 GPU.

Electronics.name: iPhone 15 Pro
Electronics.shortDesc: Forged in titanium with Pro camera system and powerful A17 Pro chip.
Electronics.longDesc: The iPhone 15 Pro features a Grade 5 titanium design, making it the lightest Pro model ever. Powered by the A17 Pro chip built on 3-nanometer technology, it delivers unprecedented performance and efficiency with advanced camera capabilities.

Electronics.name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5
Electronics.shortDesc: Revolutionary foldable smartphone that unfolds your world.
Electronics.longDesc: The Galaxy Z Fold 5 transforms from a compact phone to a tablet-sized display. With the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor and improved hinge design, it offers seamless multitasking and productivity on the go.

Electronics.name: Bose QuietComfort Ultra
Electronics.shortDesc: Premium wireless headphones with world-class noise cancellation.
Electronics.longDesc: Breakthrough spatial audio technology and legendary noise cancellation combine for an immersive listening experience. Premium materials and all-day comfort make these perfect for any environment.

Automobiles.name: Tesla Model 3
Automobiles.shortDesc: All-electric sedan with autopilot capabilities and impressive range.
Automobiles.longDesc: The Tesla Model 3 combines performance, safety, and efficiency in a stylish package. With over 300 miles of range and access to Tesla's Supercharger network, it redefines electric mobility with advanced autopilot features.

Automobiles.name: BMW i8
Automobiles.shortDesc: Futuristic hybrid sports car with iconic butterfly doors.
Automobiles.longDesc: The BMW i8 represents the future of sustainable performance with its plug-in hybrid powertrain and revolutionary carbon fiber construction. Its distinctive design and butterfly doors make it an unmistakable icon on the road.

Automobiles.name: Toyota Supra
Automobiles.shortDesc: Legendary sports car reborn with modern performance engineering.
Automobiles.longDesc: The legendary Toyota Supra returns with a perfect balance of power and precision. Featuring a turbocharged inline-6 engine and rear-wheel drive, it delivers an authentic sports car experience with modern reliability.

Automobiles.name: Porsche Taycan
Automobiles.shortDesc: Electric sports car delivering pure Porsche DNA with zero emissions.
Automobiles.longDesc: The Taycan is Porsche's first fully electric sports car, combining typical Porsche performance with pioneering electric technology. Experience the future of driving with 800V technology and lightning-fast charging.

Automobiles.name: Jeep Wrangler
Automobiles.shortDesc: Iconic off-road SUV built for adventure and authentic experiences.
Automobiles.longDesc: The Jeep Wrangler maintains its legendary off-road capability while adding modern comfort and technology. With removable doors and roof, it offers an open-air driving experience like no other vehicle.

Lifestyle & Fashion.name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG
Lifestyle & Fashion.shortDesc: Legendary basketball sneakers that defined street culture and style.
Lifestyle & Fashion.longDesc: The Air Jordan 1 changed the game when it first released in 1985. This retro version honors the original with premium leather construction and iconic colorways that continue to influence fashion decades later.

Lifestyle & Fashion.name: Adidas Ultraboost 22
Lifestyle & Fashion.shortDesc: Revolutionary running shoes with energy-returning Boost technology.
Lifestyle & Fashion.longDesc: The Ultraboost 22 features responsive Boost cushioning and a Primeknit upper for comfort and performance. Designed for runners who demand the ultimate in energy return and comfort mile after mile.

Lifestyle & Fashion.name: Ray-Ban Original Wayfarer
Lifestyle & Fashion.shortDesc: Timeless eyewear combining classic style with premium protection.
Lifestyle & Fashion.longDesc: The Original Wayfarer is the most recognizable style in the history of sunglasses. Since its debut in 1952, it has been worn by countless celebrities and style icons, defining cool for generations.

Lifestyle & Fashion.name: Fossil Gen 6 Smartwatch
Lifestyle & Fashion.shortDesc: Smart timepiece blending traditional craftsmanship with modern technology.
Lifestyle & Fashion.longDesc: The Fossil Gen 6 combines classic watch design with Wear OS by Google, offering fitness tracking, smart notifications, and customizable watch faces in a beautifully crafted stainless steel case.

Lifestyle & Fashion.name: Gucci GG Marmont Matelassé
Lifestyle & Fashion.shortDesc: Luxury leather handbag featuring iconic Italian craftsmanship and design.
Lifestyle & Fashion.longDesc: The GG Marmont line features a softly structured shape with the double G hardware and heart on the back. Crafted in matelassé chevron leather with antique gold-toned hardware for timeless luxury.

Home & Gadgets.name: Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen)
Home & Gadgets.shortDesc: Compact smart speaker with Alexa for voice control of your smart home.
Home & Gadgets.longDesc: The Echo Dot delivers crisp vocals and balanced bass for full sound. Voice control your music, ask questions, set timers, and control compatible smart home devices with ease using just your voice.

Home & Gadgets.name: Google Nest Hub (2nd Gen)
Home & Gadgets.shortDesc: Smart display that helps organize your day and control your home.
Home & Gadgets.longDesc: The Nest Hub brings helpful Google features to your home with a 7-inch screen, sleep tracking, and the ability to control thousands of compatible smart devices with just your voice or a tap.

Home & Gadgets.name: Dyson Purifier Cool TP07
Home & Gadgets.shortDesc: Advanced air purification technology that captures 99.97% of particles.
Home & Gadgets.longDesc: The Dyson Purifier Cool combines intelligent sensing with an advanced filtration system to purify your whole room. It captures gases and 99.97% of particles as small as 0.3 microns, then projects purified air throughout the room.

Home & Gadgets.name: Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance
Home & Gadgets.shortDesc: Smart lighting system with millions of colors and wireless control.
Home & Gadgets.longDesc: Transform your home with smart lighting that adapts to your daily rhythm. Create the perfect ambiance with 16 million colors and thousands of shades of white light, all controlled from your smartphone or voice.

Home & Gadgets.name: Sony Bravia XR A95L OLED
Home & Gadgets.shortDesc: Premium 4K OLED television with perfect blacks and vibrant colors.
Home & Gadgets.longDesc: The Sony Bravia XR A95L features QD-OLED technology for unprecedented brightness and color. With the Cognitive Processor XR, it delivers pictures and sound the way humans see and hear for a truly immersive experience.

Gaming Accessories.name: Razer DeathAdder V3 Pro
Gaming Accessories.shortDesc: High-precision wireless gaming mouse with ergonomic design.
Gaming Accessories.longDesc: The DeathAdder V3 Pro features Razer's most advanced sensor technology with 30,000 DPI, ultra-lightweight design, and up to 90 hours of battery life for competitive gaming without compromise.

Gaming Accessories.name: Logitech G915 TKL
Gaming Accessories.shortDesc: Premium mechanical keyboard with tactile switches and RGB backlighting.
Gaming Accessories.longDesc: The G915 TKL combines professional-grade performance with sophisticated design. Features low-profile GL mechanical switches, LIGHTSYNC RGB, and wireless connectivity for the ultimate gaming experience.

Gaming Accessories.name: Alienware AW3423DWF
Gaming Accessories.shortDesc: Ultra-wide curved gaming monitor with high refresh rate and HDR.
Gaming Accessories.longDesc: The Alienware 34-inch curved QD-OLED monitor delivers an incredible gaming experience with 165Hz refresh rate, 0.1ms response time, and stunning HDR400 True Black for perfect contrast.

Gaming Accessories.name: Elgato Stream Deck MK.2
Gaming Accessories.shortDesc: Customizable control surface for streamers and content creators.
Gaming Accessories.longDesc: The Stream Deck MK.2 features 15 customizable LCD keys that can trigger unlimited actions. Perfect for streamers, content creators, and productivity enthusiasts who want instant access to their most important functions.

Gaming Accessories.name: Meta Quest 3
Gaming Accessories.shortDesc: Standalone VR headset with mixed reality capabilities and wireless freedom.
Gaming Accessories.longDesc: The Meta Quest 3 delivers next-level performance with the Snapdragon XR2 Gen 2 processor, mixed reality experiences, and a vast library of VR games and apps. No PC or wires required.
